site_name: Development Site at, 9 Silchester Road, W10
description: Verification Order required to confirm the numbering of the newly developed units, following the erection of a 6-storey building (plus basement) comprising 11 residential units, linked to planning application PP/21/04428, as follows:(Own separate access and post point)Flat A, Ground Floor, 9 Silchester Road W10(Communal access and post point)Flat B, First Floor, 9 Silchester Road W10Flat C, First Floor, 9 Silchester Road W10Flat D, Second Floor, 9 Silchester Road W10Flat E, Second Floor, 9 Silchester Road W10Flat F, Third Floor, 9 Silchester Road W10Flat G, Third Floor, 9 Silchester Road W10Flat H, Fourth Floor, 9 Silchester Road W10Flat I, Fourth Floor, 9 Silchester Road W10Flat J, Fifth Floor, 9 Silchester Road W10Flat K, Fifth Floor, 9 Silchester Road W10
